column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The vengeful Nu Mou is bent on revenge.
Deliver the mock ancient texts to the pixies.
Report to the vengeful Nu Mou.
Grrr, those accursed pixies! I never should've trusted them!
I asked them for sheep's milk. They demanded their payment first, and against my better judgment, I gave it to them. I've not seen neither hide nor hair of them since!
But they will rue the day they cheated this Nu Mou! I'll get my revenge─with your help, mortal!
Your task is simple. Take these mock ancient texts I've prepared and give them to the pixies. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!
And if the pixies think to ask where the texts come from, just say that you found it at the Church at Dammroen Field.
Please find the cheating pixies and give them the mock ancient texts. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!
Hm? You wish to give me something, you say?
Ooh, it says here there's a secret flower garden! And the way will be revealed if one makes an offering of sheep's milk to the leafman north of here!
Tee hee, I must go and tell everyone...right after I've had my fill of the garden!
Well now, what's a mortal doing here?
This was at the church? Let's see, now... <gasp> It tells you the way to get to a secret garden!
All you need is sheep's milk, and it just so happens we have the extra we didn't give the Nu Mou! I'll go and test it out at once!
You gave the pixies the texts, and they believed it? Hah hah hah! Such sweet revenge!
Here, mortal─the fitting payment for your excellent service! Now, if you'll excuse me, I have sheep's milk to collect!
